response.overview: Fate brings two secret agents from opposing sides together in one passionate night during a mission, and they break protocol and share a one-night stand, never revealing their true identities to the other. When theyâ€™re both stripped of their licenses for failing the mission, they go undercover as regular people. Seven years later, they are both called back for a secret mission, and are paired together as a contract marriage, not realizing their true identities. They share more than just their hidden identities, turns out they have a daughter together as well.
response.title: Agents Undercovered Love
